seg.source: 北京时间8月12日消息，2016年里约奥运会女子50米步枪三种姿势决赛战罢，中国老将杜丽获得铜牌。
seg.translation: In August 12, Beijing time, the Chinese veteran Du Li won a bronze medal after completing 2016 Rio Olympics women’s 50 metre rifle three positions finals.
Beijing Time August 12 News, 2016-year-old Olympic women's 50-metre rifle three posture finals, Chinese veteran Dorrit won the bronze medal.
BEIJING, August 12 (Xinhua) -- Chinese veteran Du Li won a bronze medal in the women's 50-meter rifle three-position final at the Rio 2016 Olympic Games.

seg.source: 杜丽成为奥运四朝元老，4次奥运共拿下2金1银1铜四块奖牌。
seg.translation: Du Li has become a four Olympic Game veteran, having won a total of four medals - two gold, one silver and one bronze - in the four Games.
Dorrit became the Olympic four-headed veteran, 4 Olympic Games won 2 Gold 1 silver 1 bronze four medals.
Du Li became a veteran of the four Olympic dynasties, winning a total of two gold, one silver and four bronze medals in four Olympic Games.

seg.source: 1998年，进入山东省射击队，跟随王德文教练进行专业的射击训练。
seg.translation: In 1998, she joined the Shandong Province shooting team, and underwent professional training in shooting under the guidance of coach Wang Dewen.
1998, into the Shandong province shooting team, followed Wang coaches to carry out professional shooting training.
In 1998, entered the shooting team in Shandong Province, with coach Wang German professional shooting training.

seg.source: 2003年6月，参加射击世界杯克罗地亚站女子10米气步枪金牌并以504.9环打破世界纪录。
seg.translation: In June 2003, she took part in the Shooting World Cup women’s 10-meter air rifle standing event in Croatia, and set a world record of 504.9.
June 2003, participated in the shooting World Cup Croatian station woman 10-metre gas rifle gold medal and broke the world record with 504.9 ring.
In June 2003, she took part in the Women's 10m Air Rifle gold medal at the World Shooting Cup in Croatia and broke the world record with 504.9 rings.

seg.source: 2004年8月，获得女子10米气步枪金牌，为中国代表队在雅典奥运会夺得首金。
seg.translation: In August 2004, she won the gold medal for the women’s 10-meter air rifle competition, and claimed the first gold medal for China at the Athens Olympic Games.
August 2004, won the women's 10-metre gas rifle gold medal for the Chinese team in Athens Olympic Games won the first gold.
In August 2004, she won the gold medal in the women's 10m air rifle, winning the first gold medal for the Chinese team at the Athens Olympic Games.

seg.source: 2008年8月，在50米运动步枪三姿的比赛中以总成绩690.3环破奥运会纪录夺得金牌。
seg.translation: Won the Gold Metal by 690.3 total shots in the 50 meter rifle three positions.
In August 2008, he won the gold medal in the 50-metre sports rifle three-posture race with a total 690.3-ring-breaking Olympic record.
In August 2008, he won the gold medal in the 50-meter sport rifle three-position competition, breaking the Olympic record with a total score of 690.3.

seg.source: 2012年8月，折戟伦敦奥运会后，杜丽向国际射联申报了暂时退役申请。
seg.translation: After experiencing a defeat at the London Olympics in August 2012, Du Li submitted a temporary resignation application to the International Shooting Sport Federation.
After the London Olympic Games in August 2012, Dorrit filed a temporary retirement application with the International Union.
In August 2012, after the London Olympics in Trident, Dooley filed an application for temporary retirement with the International Association of Shooters.

seg.source: 2015年1月，杜丽宣布重回国家队开始训练，备战里约奥运。
seg.translation: In January 2015, Du Li announced that she will be reporting to the national team for training and prepare for the Rio Olympics.
In January 2015, Dorrit announced a return to the national team to start training for the Rio Olympics.
In January 2015, Dooley announced her return to the national team to start training in preparation for the Rio Olympics.

seg.source: 2016年3月，里约奥运选拔赛结束，时隔8年再次获得女子10米气步枪奥运会参赛资格。
seg.translation: The qualifying rounds of the Rio Olympics were concluded in March 2016. After an eight-year hiatus, she regained the opportunity to join the women’s 10-metre air rifle event in the Olympics.
March 2016, the Rio Olympic trials end, after a lapse of 8 years to obtain the women's 10-metre air rifle Olympic competition eligibility.
Rio's Olympic trials ended in March 2016 and again qualified for the Women's 10m Air Rifle Olympic Games after eight years.

seg.source: 2016年8月6日，在里约奥运会女子十米气步枪赛事中，杜丽以207环的成绩获得银牌。
seg.translation: During the 10-meter air rifle competition at the Rio Olympics on August 6, 2016, Du Li won a silver medal with 207 points.
August 6, 2016, in the Rio Olympic Games women's 10-metre air rifle competition, Dorrit with 207 ring results won the silver medal.
Dolly won a silver medal with 207 rings in the women's 10m air rifle event at the Rio Olympics on August 6, 2016.

seg.source: 2016年8月12日，在里约奥运会女子50米步枪三种姿势比赛中，获得铜牌。
seg.translation: Won the Bronze Metal in the woman 50 meter rifle three positions in the Rio Olympic Games on Aug. 12, 2016
August 12, 2016, in the Rio Olympic Games women's 50-metre rifle three posture competition, won the bronze medal.
Bronze medal in the women's 50m rifle three-position competition at the Rio Olympics on August 12, 2016.
